channel.title: Component: `opsgenie` on Cloud Posse Developer Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Component: `opsgenie` on Cloud Posse Developer Hub

item.title: Opsgenie Resources
item.description: Opsgenie Resources The following Opsgenie resources are configured (see resources): API Integrations Teams Users Notification Policies Alert Policies Services Service Incident Rules Escalations api_integrations.yaml NOTE: We provision a Datadog integration without specifying the owning team. Because of that, all alerts coming to Opsgenie from Datadog do not get assigned to a team automatically (if we specified the owning team, then all alerts would go to the members of the team).
